title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Targets in Southern Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Military Offensive”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Military command and terror infrastructure; IDF attacked Hezbollah terror targets in southern Lebanon

A short time ago, fighter jets attacked several terror targets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah, in Lebanese territory.

Among the targets attacked, three military commands in the areas of Al-Nakoura and Ayta Al-Shaab, where organization’s terrorists operated, alongside two terror infrastructures in the Al-Khiam and Marwahin areas.
Earlier today, another terror infrastructure was attacked in the Al-Kafar Bistan area.

During the day, three launchings that crossed from Lebanese territory to Shlomi area were identified and fell in open ground.
IDF forces attacked the shooting sources and other areas in south Lebanon with artillery.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3UEL0dR
